noun.description: A person who kills himself or herself.

origin: Mid 17th century; earliest use found in David Person (fl. 1635). From auto- + -cide (hence an early hybrid formation, showing an element ultimately of Greek origin combined with one ultimately of Latin origin)<br>1920s. From auto- + -cide. In the specific uses with reference to suicide, after suicide<br>1960s; earliest use found in Journal Agriculture. From auto- + -cide.
